title: Salesforce | PayPal | 10 years Experienced
content:
Education: BTech IT
Years of Experience: 10.6
Prior Experience: Product based company (Chennai)
Previous Compensation -> 34 Base + 6 Variable = 40 LPA


Company : PayPal
Title/Level: MTS-1 (T25 level)
Location: Chennai
Base Salary: 45 LPA (Inc. PF)
Bonus: 10% of base
Stock bonus: 57000 USD -> Divided in 3 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 45L + 4.5L + 16L ~ 65.5 LPA for 1st year
Other details: Hybrid


Company : Salesforce
Title/Level: SMTS
Location: Hyderabad
Base Salary: 50 LPA (Inc. PF)
Relocation Bonus: 1.5L
Joining Bonus: 3L
Stock bonus: 74K USD -> Divided in 4 years.
Bonus: 15% of base salary -> 7.5L
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 50 + 7.5 + 16L ~ 72.5 LPA (First year)
Other details: Hybrid (~2 days every week)


Wanted to know which would be a better offer in terms of work life balance and growth. Felt salesforce offered role is a lower once for my level of experience.


Will also share a separate post on the interview experiences as a whole.

title: Agoda | SSE Fullstack | Gurgaon | 9.9 YOE
content:
Hello all,
I have got an offer from Agoda Gurgaon for Senior Software Engineer Fullstack. 
Though I was interviewed for Staff Software , was downgraded to Senior Software Engineer which I was not expecting. 9.9 YOE.
No other offers apart from Agoda.

**Previous Compensation**
41 LPA

**Offer**:
Education: BTech (Tier 2 college)
Years of Experience: 9.9 YOE
Date of the Offer: Jan 2025
Company: Agoda
Title/Level: Senior Software Engineer
Location: Gurgram
Salary: 48 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4.8 LPA
PF: 2.8 LPA 
Bonus: 9 LPA
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 65 LPA (1st year), 60 LPA ( 2nd year onwards )
Benefits: Insurances, relocation costs, wellness reimbusements, agoda Staff Discount 30K, Uber Credits, WFH Allowance 33K

LPA = Lakhs per Annum / year (Indian rupees)
Is it a good deal or is there a chance of increase?

Need advise: Should I join?
